Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Dear Heritrix friends,

I am a researcher using heritrix to build a focused crawler  in my experimental work.
 I have a new crawling strategy which determines which pages to retrieve next so that it keeps your crawler focused on a psecific topic,

This strategy depends on examining the ststus of some features in the retrieved page, depending on this estimation , it would be determined which URL to get next.

I am asking the following:

1-Where to put this crawling strategy? As a frontier,  or a filter
2- I want to display the results in a web page , like that displayed by search engines.

I would appreciate your help very much.

A.M. Ghozia
